description:
The Abduction Group are the rival gang to the http://anidb.net/ch99605 [Kuroga Clan]. They were hired by http://anidb.net/ch98591 [Saiga Zenji] to kidnap http://anidb.net/ch97028 [Masaru] as part of his plan to adopt him and take his money.
Source: Karakuri Circus Wiki
name: Yuukai-gumi
